snippet.title: STEEP - Players try out the Extreme Pack
snippet.description:
It's time to go Extreme! 
5 Steep players flew to Annecy to meet the STEEP Dev team and try out the Extreme Pack challenges ! 

Extreme Pack: Available 27/06

Get ready to take your STEEP experience to a whole new level. Join the Icarus crew in a new story and own the skies with 3 adrenaline-fueled new sports, additional challenges and new customisation items. 
 All included in the Extreme Pack!

Website: http://steepgame.com/
